languages.text: {n}Кибелла бросает долгий взгляд в визор Паскаля и вопросительно поднимает бровь. Техножрец отвечает длительным молчанием, а затем скрипит:{/n} "Благодарю за содействие. Запрос отклонен. Катехизис велит свершить сие рукой уполномоченной единицы".

{n}Kibellah gives Pasqal a long look, her eyebrow raised in a silent question. Pasqal responds with an equally long silence, then creaks,{/n} "Thank you for your cooperation. Request denied. The Catechism demands that this act be performed by an authorised unit."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла бросает долгий взгляд в визор Паскаля и вопросительно поднимает бровь. Техножрец отвечает длительным молчанием, а затем скрипит:{/n} "Благодарю за содействие. Запрос отклонен. Катехизис велит свершить сие рукой уполномоченной единицы".

{n}Kibellah gives Pasqal a long look, her eyebrow raised in a silent question. Pasqal responds with an equally long silence, then creaks,{/n} "Thank you for your cooperation. Request denied. The Catechism demands that this act be performed by an authorised unit."

{n}Kibellah gives Pasqal a long look, her eyebrow raised in a silent question. Pasqal responds with an equally long silence, then creaks,{/n} "Thank you for your cooperation. Request denied. The Catechism demands that this act be performed by an authorised unit."

{n}Kibellah gives Pasqal a long look, her eyebrow raised in a silent question. Pasqal responds with an equally long silence, then creaks,{/n} "Thank you for your cooperation. Request denied. The Catechism demands that this act be performed by an authorised unit."

{n}Kibellah gives Pasqal a long look, her eyebrow raised in a silent question. Pasqal responds with an equally long silence, then creaks,{/n} "Thank you for your cooperation. Request denied. The Catechism demands that this act be performed by an authorised unit."

{n}Kibellah gives Pasqal a long look, her eyebrow raised in a silent question. Pasqal responds with an equally long silence, then creaks,{/n} "Thank you for your cooperation. Request denied. The Catechism demands that this act be performed by an authorised unit."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah mira largo y tendido a Pasqal, arqueando la ceja a modo de pregunta. Pasqal responde con un silencio igual de largo, y luego de viva voz, con un chirrido:{/n} «Gracias por su colaboración. Petición denegada. El Catequismo exige que el acto lo obre una unidad autorizada».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah gives Pasqal a long look, her eyebrow raised in a silent question. Pasqal responds with an equally long silence, then creaks,{/n} "Thank you for your cooperation. Request denied. The Catechism demands that this act be performed by an authorised unit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah mira largo y tendido a Pasqal, arqueando la ceja a modo de pregunta. Pasqal responde con un silencio igual de largo, y luego de viva voz, con un chirrido:{/n} «Gracias por su colaboración. Petición denegada. El Catequismo exige que el acto lo obre una unidad autorizada».

languages.text: {n}キベラはパスカルをじっと見つめ、眉を上げることで無言の問いかけをする。パスカルは同じように長い沈黙で応え、最後にきしむ声を上げた。{/n}「ご協力ありがとうございました。ご要望は却下されました。要理では、この行為が認可済の部隊によって実行されことを要求しています」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah gives Pasqal a long look, her eyebrow raised in a silent question. Pasqal responds with an equally long silence, then creaks,{/n} "Thank you for your cooperation. Request denied. The Catechism demands that this act be performed by an authorised unit."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラはパスカルをじっと見つめ、眉を上げて無言の質問をした。パスカルは同じように長い沈黙で応え、{/n}「ご協力ありがとうございました。ご要望は却下されました。カテキズムでは、この行為が認可済の部隊によって行われることを要求しています」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈盯着帕斯卡看了很久，扬起一条眉毛，仿佛问了个无声的问题。帕斯卡也同样沉默了许久，之后音阵装置发出了噼啪作响的声音。{/n}“感谢你的合作。请求已驳回，根据《操作与维护原理》规定，此种行为必须由授权单位执行。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah gives Pasqal a long look, her eyebrow raised in a silent question. Pasqal responds with an equally long silence, then creaks,{/n} "Thank you for your cooperation. Request denied. The Catechism demands that this act be performed by an authorised unit."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈盯着帕斯卡看了很久，扬起一条眉毛，仿佛问了个无声的问题。帕斯卡也同样沉默了许久，之后音阵装置发出了噼啪作响的声音。{/n}“感谢你的合作。请求已驳回，根据《操作与维护原理》规定，此种行为必须由授权单位执行。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah wirft Pasqal einen langen Blick zu, eine Braue angehoben wie eine schweigende Frage. Pasqal antwortet mit einem ebenso langen Schweigen und krächzt dann:{/n} "Danke für Eure Kooperation. Anfrage abgewiesen. Der Katechismus verlangt, dass diese Handlung von einer autorisierten Einheit durchgeführt wird."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah gives Pasqal a long look, her eyebrow raised in a silent question. Pasqal responds with an equally long silence, then creaks,{/n} "Thank you for your cooperation. Request denied. The Catechism demands that this act be performed by an authorised unit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah wirft Pasqal einen langen Blick zu, eine Braue angehoben wie eine schweigende Frage. Pasqal antwortet mit einem ebenso langen Schweigen und krächzt dann:{/n} "Danke für Eure Kooperation. Anfrage abgewiesen. Der Katechismus verlangt, dass diese Handlung von einer autorisierten Einheit durchgeführt wird."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah adresse un long regard à Pasqal, haussant les sourcils comme pour formuler une question silencieuse. Le technaugure lui oppose à son tour un silence tout aussi long, avant de répondre d'une voix grinçante :{/n} « Merci pour votre coopération. Demande rejetée. Le catéchisme exige que cet acte soit accompli par une unité accréditée. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah gives Pasqal a long look, her eyebrow raised in a silent question. Pasqal responds with an equally long silence, then creaks,{/n} "Thank you for your cooperation. Request denied. The Catechism demands that this act be performed by an authorised unit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah adresse un long regard à Pasqal, haussant les sourcils comme pour formuler une question silencieuse. Le technaugure lui oppose à son tour un silence tout aussi long, avant de répondre d'une voix grinçante :{/n} « Merci pour votre coopération. Demande rejetée. Le catéchisme exige que cet acte soit accompli par une unité accréditée. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, Pasqal'a uzun bir bakış atıyor. Kaşlarını söze dökmediği bir merakla kaldırıyor. Pasqal da eşit derecede uzun bir sessizlikle yanıt veriyor. Ardından gıcırdayarak konuşuyor.{/n} "İş birliğin için teşekkür ederim. Talep reddedildi. İlmihâl, bu eylemin onaylı bir birim tarafından gerçekleştirilmesini emrediyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah gives Pasqal a long look, her eyebrow raised in a silent question. Pasqal responds with an equally long silence, then creaks,{/n} "Thank you for your cooperation. Request denied. The Catechism demands that this act be performed by an authorised unit."
